question: Shakespeare wrote the line, "These violent delights have violent ends" in the tragedy Romeo and Juliet.

On the tv show Spongebob Squarepants, during "The Camping Episode" Squidward is attacked
 by a sea-bear because he eats cubed cheese, plays the clarinet badly, and wears a hat in a goofy fashion.
The song, "Best Day Ever" performed by Spongebob Squarepants starts with the lyrics, "Mr. Sun came up and he smiled at me! Said it's gonna be a good one just wait and see!"
In the episode "I Had an Accident", Spongebob locks himself in his house and befriends a penny, a krabby patty, and an actual gorilla.
In the episode "The Frycook Games", Patrick screams "MY NAME'S NOT RICK!!!" while wrestling Spongebob to win the games for THe Chum Bucket.
In the episode "Wet Painters", Spongebob and Patrick spill paint on Mr. Krabs' prized clown picture.
In the episode "House Fancy", Squilliam showcases a giant sculpture of his unibrow that is made from Squidward's tears.
In the episode "Pest of the West", Spongebob and Patrick have a musical number where they sing about being friends while riding in coffins.
In the episode "The Graveyard Shift", Squidward tells Spongebob the stroy of the Hash Slinging Slasher.
In the episode "Pizza Delivery", Spongebob and Squidward deliver a krabby patty pizza all the way across town and the customer is grateful.
